title: League won't open after i click launch
body: I've had this problem before and I've had it fixed by reinstalling the game. I really don't wanna go through that, however, so is there any other solution?

replies.body: Can ya try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)? Let me know if this caused any change. ^.^
